bruschetta.description: A classic Italian appetizer consisting of grilled bread rubbed with garlic and topped with tomatoes, fresh basil, and olive oil.
bruschetta.ingredients:
• Bread slices
• Ripe tomatoes
• Fresh basil
• Garlic
• Olive oil
• Salt & pepper
bruschetta.recipe:
1. Toast bread slices
2. Rub with garlic
3. Dice tomatoes and mix with chopped basil
4. Add olive oil, salt, pepper
5. Top bread with mixture

pasta_carbonara.description: Traditional Roman pasta dish made with eggs, hard cheese, guanciale, and black pepper.
pasta_carbonara.ingredients:
• Spaghetti 400g
• Guanciale 150g
• Eggs 3
• Pecorino cheese 100g
• Black pepper
pasta_carbonara.recipe:
1. Cook pasta al dente
2. Fry guanciale until crispy
3. Mix eggs, cheese, and pepper
4. Combine everything off heat
5. Serve immediately

tiramisu.description: Popular Italian dessert of coffee-soaked ladyfingers layered with mascarpone cream.
tiramisu.ingredients:
• Ladyfingers
• Mascarpone cheese
• Eggs
• Coffee
• Cocoa powder
• Sugar
tiramisu.recipe:
1. Brew strong coffee
2. Mix mascarpone with eggs and sugar
3. Dip ladyfingers in coffee
4. Layer with cream
5. Dust with cocoa
